articles.title: Over 6000 Scans Reveal What ADHD Looks Like In The Brain - IFLScience
articles.description: Data from thousands of kids has been used to map connectivity patterns in the ADHD brain.
articles.content: Using a new analytical technique, scientists have been able to study brain images from more than 6,000 children to identify connectivity patterns that are common to people with attention-deficit/hype… [+2509 chars]

articles.title: The breakfast, lunch and dinner plan that will help you lose weight - and keep it off permanently - GB News

articles.title: 'Wildly weird' RNA bits discovered infesting the microbes in our guts - Nature.com
articles.description: Rod-shaped stuctures named ‘Obelisks’ are even smaller than viruses but can still transmit instructions to cells.
